TypeSignature.Value: public class DatagramSocket : Java.Lang.Object, IDisposable, Java.IO.ICloseable

type DatagramSocket = class inherit Object interface ICloseable interface IJavaObject interface IDisposable

Docs.summary: This class implements a UDP socket for sending and receiving DatagramPacket.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Constructs a UDP datagram socket which is bound to any available port on the local host using a wildcard address.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if an error occurs while creating or binding the socket.
